subject: Re: [junit] ClassCastException while calling EJB's from JUnit
msgSnippet: ... stumbled across the answer myself: the home and remote interfaces of the ejb should be added to the list of excluded classes in the excluded.properties
messageBody:
... stumbled across the answer myself:

the home and remote interfaces of the ejb should be added to the list of
excluded classes in the excluded.properties file.

(Jens Schumann posted the solution to this on the Orion interest group)




steven.hale@sb
ab.se Till: junit@yahoogroups.com
Kopia:
2001-12-03 Ärende: [junit] ClassCastException while calling EJB's from JUnit
11:36
Sänd svar till
junit







According to the JUnit faq the solution to this problem is to "use
excluded.properties ...or turn off reloading".

Turning off reloading works but isn't the best solution. I've tried
unsuccessfully to exclude various packages but so far no joy. Any ideas
which packages have to be excluded for this to work? We're running WLS
6.0sp1.

Steven Hale, wm-data
